channel.title: Felix Krusch - Web Design & Development Blog
channel.description: Insights on web design, development, SEO, and digital strategy from Felix Krusch, freelance web designer and developer based in Montreal.

item.title: Test Blog Post 2
item.description: This is a second test blog post to demonstrate the MDX blogging system.

item.title: Hello World!
item.description: Welcome to my new MDX-powered blog. This is the first post in my journey of sharing insights about web development, design, and digital strategy.
